BBEX3.A.DZD.USD.CA.AB.A04: Exchange rates for the US dollar in Algeria / USD 1 = DZD ... (selling)
Source: Banque d'Algerie (formerly: Banque Centrale d'Algerie), Algiers.
Methodology: Calculated on the basis of mid-month and month-end rates.

Comment on 1991: On 30 September 1991, the Algerian dinar was devalued. We recorded the following exchange rates (buying/selling rate). 27 September 1991: USD 1 = DZD 17.6285/17.643530 September 1991: USD 1 = DZD 21.4314/21.4464. Calculated devaluation: 17.7%.

Comment on 1994: On 10 April 1994, the Algerian dinar was devalued. We recorded the following exchange rates (buying/selling rate). 8 April 1994: USD 1 = DZD 25.6762 / 25.691211 April 1994: USD 1 = DZD 35.9110 / 35.9260. Calculated devaluation: 28.5%.
